startScreen: Hello player! Welcome to my game spot. To know the rules click the rules button or if you know what you are in for just "Press Start" to play!
gameStart: Here we go! please guess the next number...
So what's your answer? remember that you can still take a hint.
checkingAnswer: You were RIGHT on the spot ...
No problem though. You won't loose anything.
Too bad you weren't right this time!
and do be careful ... you're LOOSING LIVES here!

finalResponse.below_avg: Why don't you try your luck again?
finalResponse.mediocre: Hang in there and do your best.
finalResponse.good: It was nice seeing a player such as yourself!
finalResponse.excellent: People rarely make it this far
